briefTitle: CyclASol for the Treatment of Signs and Symptoms of Dry Eye Disease in Subjects Who Completed CYS-004
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Multi-center, Open-label, Single-arm Clinical Trial to Assess the Long-term Safety and Tolerability of Topical CyclASolÂ® for the Treatment of Dry Eye Disease in Subjects Who Completed the Clinical Trial CYS-004
summary: The objective of this trial is to evaluate safety and tolerability of CyclASol during long-term use in subjects with Dry Eye Disease.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Subjects Reporting Any Adverse Events
